projects.title: Airbnb Like Rental Marketplace
projects.description: An Airbnb-like rental marketplace web application that connects property owners with potential renters. Features include secure user authentication, comprehensive property listings, real-time booking, interactive maps, and a user review system, all built with React.js, Node.js, and MongoDB.

projects.title: Simon Say Game
projects.description: A classic Simon Says game built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This interactive game tests users' memory by challenging them to replicate increasingly complex sequences of lights and sounds.

projects.title: Todo List
projects.description: One of the first game I was working on my college. I had to develop front-end implementation for game that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in web development . I've learned a lot!
